channel.title: Making ppl freeze on 1 place
channel.description:
So When i do command ::jail [ Name ] They go in jail but can walk there!, So i want it like theres automatic Barrage, so they cant move!
Any help ? Because i dont know words how to find out on turorials.
... Problem

item.title: Making ppl freeze on 1 place
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Use a boolean and return it true once the player is teleported to jail, and also if they login jail, return it false once they have gotten out. Edit the walking packet to only work if the boolean is false.

Read full topic
